scripts.apiDocs: yarn generateHeader && yarn generateApidocConfig && cd ./scripts/apidoc_scripts/ && ../../../../../node_modules/.bin/apidoc-markdown -i ../../server/routes -c ./apidoc_config.json -o ./ML_API.mdx --parse-workers apischema=./schema_worker/index.js --parse-parsers apischema=./schema_parser/index.js --parse-filters apiversion=./version_filter/index.js --header ./header.md --template ./template.md
